sentences.english: A policy of neutrality or nonalignment in international affairs.
sentences.chinese: 国际事务中保持中立或不结盟的政策。

sentences.english: The nations of the Non-Aligned Movement were invited as well.
sentences.chinese: 不结盟运动的国家也受到邀请。

sentences.english: The new treaty embodies the aspirations of most nonaligned countries.
sentences.chinese: 新条约体现了大多数不结盟国家的愿望。

sentences.english: Nonalignment is the part and parcel of that country's foreign policy.
sentences.chinese: 不结盟是那个国家外交政策的重要内容。

sentences.english: Our country pursues a policy of nonalignment.
The paper was divided into three parts to expatiate on and analyse the Chinese non-alignment foreign strategy.
sentences.chinese: 本文分三部分对中国不结盟外交战略进行阐述和分析。

sentences.english: In sum, Myanmars foreign policy has really been neutral and nonaligned.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，缅甸的对外政策确实是中立和不结盟的。

sentences.english: Envoys from mainly non-aligned developing nations were on the tour.
sentences.chinese: 参观代表主要来自不结盟的发展中国家。

sentences.english: China diplomatic alliance underwent two stages from alliance to non-alliance.
sentences.chinese: 中国外交联盟观经历了从结盟到不结盟两个阶段。

sentences.english: China is one advocates the nonaligned movement the country.
sentences.chinese: 中国是一个主张不结盟运动的国家。

sentences.english: The non-aligned group included countries that did not want to be tied to either the West or the East.
sentences.chinese: 包括不结盟国家集团的国家，不希望被束缚到西或东。

definition: to combine together for self-improvement/joint movement for self-strengthening
